author: ianna
body:
- Auto-fix includes with iwyu as follows:

```
cmsrel CMSSW_8_1_DEVEL_X_2016-05-09-2300
cd CMSSW_8_1_DEVEL_X_2016-05-09-2300/src
cmsenv
git cms-addpkg DetectorDescription
scram b COMPILER=iwyu -k > & log.log
python /cvmfs/cms-ib.cern.ch/2016-20/slc6_amd64_gcc530/external/llvm/3.8.0/bin/fix_includes.py < log.log
```
title: Detector Description Include What You Use
